page.title: 19Sports Day
page.content: Every year at the end of the summer term the primary school holds a Sports Day.The school is divided up into two teams,which compete against each other in a friendly way.The main emphasis is on enjoyment and fun. The races comprise of sprint,skipping, sack,egg and spoon,space-hopper, obstacle,hoola-hoop,piggy back and relay.You get three points for coming in first,two points for second,and one point for third. During the afternoon there are races for mums,dads and toddlers.At the end of the afternoon the points are added up and the winning team announced.Everyone has had a good time.
